translations.translation: After having turned to carious bones?"
even after we have been reduced to bones, hollow and rotten?”
after we have become bones and dust?"
Even after we are bones Nakhirah"
What! when we are rotten bones?
What, when we are bones old and wasted?'
Even after we are crumbled bones?
even after we have turned into decayed bones?"
When we have become bones decayed!
What, even after we have been decayed bones?!’
What! - when we shall have become rotten bones?"
Even after we are crumbled bones?"
even after we are fragmented bones'
When we have become hollow bones?”
Even if we should be decayed bones?
[79:11] What! When we have been decayed bones?’ (nakhira: a variant reading has nākhira, ‘decayed and withered’), will we have life again?
(Even after we are crumbled bones?) Will Allah resurrect us? How is this possible?

commentaries.author: زيد بن علي
commentaries.text:
وقوله تعالى: { عِظَاماً نَّخِرَةً } معناه باليةٌ
 ونَّخِرةٌ: أي تَنخَرُ إذا دخَلتهَا الرِّيحُ

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: ثمَّ يزيدون الإنكار على الإنكار بقولهم: { أَإِذَا كُنَّا عِظَاماً نَّخِرَةً } [النازعات: 11] بالية رميمة، نُبعث ونحيا؟! كلاًّ وحاشا، من أين يتأتى لنا هذا؟!
